description: This is the MainActivity class for a Kotlin-based Android application, serving as the main entry point and launcher activity that initializes the UI and sets a simple greeting message.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity for the Expense Tracker app, extending AppCompatActivity, responsible for initializing the user interface and setting initial display text.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: The lifecycle method called when the activity is created; it inflates the layout and sets the activity's title and greeting text.
